pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Causal Mediation Analysis using 'Stan' // Performs parametric mediation analysis using the Bayesian g-formula approach for binary and continuous outcomes. The methodology is based on Comment (2018) doi:10.5281/zenodo.1285275 and a demonstration of its application can be found at Yimer et al. (2022) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2210.08499.
